channel.title: What do i take to University?
channel.description:
Hello!, yes, it has come to that time, i am off to university and i need to start making a list of what i need! now, for those who already know me, know i am a forgetful, unorganised idiot, hense the list.. :) so if you have been to university or can find any useful links/articles relating to this topic, i would much appriciate it!
i am going to Manchester University to study Computer Science if you are interested
Thanks, Ollie.

item.title: What do i take to University?
item.dc:creator: @sup000 sup000
item.description:
@sup000 wrote:

Moparisthebest:

But Ollie lives in the UK, where only criminals can own guns. So I would suggest a knife.

you should be hung for saying that considering the current state of affairs with knife crime in the #uk

Read full topic

It sucks.

item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

For the weapon:
Stun gun. get one off ebay, really cheap but still.

I have one. I ride MARTA and the bus daily. But the fuckers on the MARTA are crazyyy.

Bus ride is like, a bunch of old businessmen.
MARTA is like, a bunch of crazy black wannabe thugs.

item.title: What do i take to University?
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

You should still bring a concealed weapon, regardless of where you are. It’s always better to be prepared. A S&W 9mm SA would do nicely in an environment like that, just slip under your mattress or hide it in the space behind your mini fridge. That’s where I keep a couple of mine.

http://www.smith-wesson.com/webapp/wcs/stores/servlet/ProductDisplay?catalogId=11101&storeId=10001&productId=68446&langId=-1&parent_category_rn=15711&isFirearm=Y

I always get an extended clip because I have large hands.

Read full topic
item.source: What do i take to University?

item.title: What do i take to University?
item.dc:creator: @_Vengeance _Vengeance
item.description:
@_Vengeance wrote:

MITB: This isn’t an American uni…

On topic:
Laptop if you have one seeing as you’re doing comp science
Lecture books
Pens, pencils / other stationary you may need
Food or money as MITB said
Probably a graphics calculator as well.

Read full topic

item.title: What do i take to University?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

That’s a good Uni. I plan to go there. That or Coventry, York or Bristol.

The Student Room

The what to take to Uni list

Well here is a list of what to take to Uni from http://www.studential.com/checklist/ I have a few comments in red about it. Documents Passport photo

You might of already seen that as The Student Room is a pretty popular place, but good place to ask Qs like that.

I’m not of much help /still in college -.-

Read full topic
